item.name: User Roles
Creates a new user and role mapping.

variable.description: (Required) Unique identifier of a user role.

response.name: New user and role mapping created.

item.name: Get a list of users mapped to a user role in a learnCenter.

variable.description: (Required) Unique identifier of a user role.

query.description: If set to true, the payload includes a total number of rows that satisfies the request. Use of this parameter determines if the 'last' link is displayed for a pageable collection.
Specify how many items should be returned in a payload. Must be lower than server default limit size.
Specify starting point of the response.
